item.title: Command help please
item.dc:creator: @llamamastafu llamamastafu
item.description:
@llamamastafu wrote:

[quote=“ianternet, post:10, topic:109332”]ok ive done that can someone connect to my serv via
ham please to test
ham user: = jail1
ham Pass: = 123

NOTE
you need 377 cache client[/quote]
ham sucks, its a virus, it makes your computer COMPLETELY vulnerable to the outside world, and it doesn’t require testing, it works… just make sure you’re logged in after them. (your connection to the server is fresher, i dunno why its needed but it is)

item.title: Command help please
item.dc:creator: @llamamastafu llamamastafu
item.description:
@llamamastafu wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:5, topic:109332”]L2OOP

client whateverclient = whatever; whateverclient.teleportToWhatever = something; whateverclient.etc();[/quote]
someone knows what they’re doing on mopar!!! omg!!! lol, sorry… just 99% of the people here are complete fucking morons.

if(command.startsWith("jail") && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); int noobid = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); if(name != null && noobid != -1) { client noob = (client) server.playerHandler.players[noobid]; noob.teleportToX = 3224; noob.teleportToY = 3612; } }

enjoy

item.title: Command help please
item.dc:creator: @ianternet ianternet
item.description:
@ianternet wrote:

no i purely want a command that only admins can do that tele ports people into my teleblocked jail so they cant excape ive done the jail part i just need this command[br][size=1]Posted on: 11 June 2007, 15:11:31[/size][hr][quote=“VorargC, post:3, topic:109332”]Hmm
Try messing around with this. =p

if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them"; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } }[/quote]

i was trying but not makiing much progress

Read full topic

item.title: Command help please
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Hmm
EDIT: Try this? I dunno

if (command.startsWith("jail") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = 3224; p.teleportToY = 3612; p.heightLevel = 0; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them"; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } }

item.description:

i want to like do a command jail were it teleports players 2 a certain spot but idk how to make it teleport the players name this is what i got

if(command.startsWith("jail") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Chaos"))) teleportToX = 3224; teleportToY = 3612; }

i just need to find out how 2 make it tele playername :S
